alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN SAN MIGUEL AND NORTHERN GUADALUPE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Variadero to 9 miles north of Pastura. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Conchas, Colonias, Variadero, Conchas Lake State Park, Conchas Dam, Puerto De Luna, Newkirk, Santa Rosa Lake State Park and Cuervo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 258 and 300. State Road 104 between Mile Markers 41 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on Interstate 40 will create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County
